captions.text: - Yeah so I waited there for like an hour,
but he never showed up, so I went home.
- Yeah, after nine pm he's useless.
- What did you do last night?

- I watched "The Avengers"
for the 100th time.
- And that's like a magic movie, right?
Like Tony Stark, he's a genius billionaire
and then he made the Iron Man suits,
and that's how he was able to be Iron Man.

- Wait, Tony Stark doesn't
have any sort of curse
put on him from like a wizard?
He just created a body suit?
and it'll make me really happy.
- OK, I will watch "The Avengers" with you
if you come and keep me company
- No, I need you to come with me

I will come with you
when you get a manicure.
- Big reveal, I'm getting a gel manicure.
I warmed up the seat for you.
- Allison, don't look at your phone.
This is a very important part.

- Is Scarlett Johansson
dating one of them?

- Oh OK.
- But don't pause it.

- What--
- Uh huh, yeah don't pause it.
- You're missing tons of funny parts.
- Oh man, drank too much juice.
You think they made this all CGI

- Yeah, I'm just waiting
for my tea to brew.
- No, I'm skimming the New Yorker.
- Oh my God, is it still happening?
- Yeah, we have an hour left.
- I guess I just have one question.

They should deliver on
what they're promising me!

- [Woman with Purple Hair]
It's a lot of science!
If you would just read the--
